'''Brown Maple Flooring''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Brown Maple Flooring is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

When used in Inner Rooms, it uses a Tatami Mat design instead

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Maple Wood = 24
|Yellow Dye = 6
|sort = Maple Wood;Yellow Dye
}}
